definitions.definition: A smooth tool that assists in putting the foot into a shoe , by sliding the heel in after the toe is in place.
Anything by which a transaction is facilitated ; a medium .
Anything which draws on or allures ; an inducement .

main_definition: A smooth tool that assists in putting the foot into a shoe , by sliding the heel in after the toe is in place.
secondary_definitions: ( derogatory ) Anything by which a transaction is facilitated ; a medium .
( obsolete ) Anything which draws on or allures ; an inducement .
